Package Model

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Box
    This class represents every block the background is made of.
    Bullet
    This class is for the bullets which Dante's gun shoots.
    Camera
    This class is the Camera.
    Coin
    This class is in order to create Coins which can be used to buy upgrades.
    DamageObstacle
    This class represents the obstacle which does damage to the player.
    Dante
    Dante is the main character in this game.
    Door
    This class represents the doors in the game.
    EndBoss
    This enemy is able to shoot and moves to the direction of Dante
    Enemy
    This is a very simple and dumb enemy which just walks around.
    EscMenu
    This class creates the menu which is displayed when pressed esc.
    Game
    This is the main class of the whole program.
    GameObject
    Abstract class from which every kind of object in the game extends from.
    GenerateLevel
    This class generates all the levels by loading the sprites.
    InGameDialog
    In this class the little dialogues within the game are displayed.
    LevelDialog
    With this class the player gets introduced to the new level with a growing label which indicates the name of the level.
    LoadLevel
    This class loads all the levels which are displayed in the game.
    MainMenu
    Menu which the player sees at first in order to decide whether to start a new game, continue the game or to set the music and sound volume.
    Miniboss
    This is the "miniboss" in the fourth level.
    Music
    This class is here to play every music and sound effect of the game.
    ShotEnemy
    This enemy is able to shoot and moves to the direction of Dante
    SmartEnemy
    This enemy follows Dante and does damage to him.
    SpawnEnemiesInRoom
    This class spawns the enemies in a room depending on the desired amount and types of enemies.
    StoryDialog
    This class shows the story on a label within a JPanel.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    GameState
    Enum for the different states the game can get in order to display the right window
    ID
    Enum to identify the different objects in the game.
    Levels
    This enum contains every level's name.
